name: Logiless Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of an inventory management platform designed to collectively manage orders and inventory. The company's platform automates the work of e-commerce business from ordering to shipping eliminating manual work from order receipt to shipment, realizing speedy shipment, enabling warehouse operators to improve their productivity.
